meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sam Bernhard Donna Fairweather-Foley Meredith Larson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6728.

td.p: Sam Bernhard, a student originally from Blacksburg, Virginia
Donna Fairweather-Foley, a retired police officer from Huntington, New York
Meredith Larson, an attorney from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,900)

tr.td: A RIVER RUNS THROUGH IT
POP QUIZ
IN THE BILL OF RIGHTS
THAT WORD SMARTS!
CAESAR
SALAD
